item.Title: CQ{{EOR}}
item.Definition: #++ # # Short CQ call, stops TX when all text sent. # #-- # cq cq de <my:callsign> <my:callsign> cq cq de <my:callsign> <my:callsign> pse k<stop>{{EOR}}

item.Title: CQ DX{{EOR}}
item.Definition: #++ # # Longer CQ call, stops TX when all text sent. # #-- # cq dx cq dx de <my:callsign> <my:callsign> cq dx cq dx de <my:callsign> <my:callsign> pse k<stop>{{EOR}}

item.Title: QRZ{{EOR}}
item.Definition: #++ # # QRZ, stops TX when all text sent. # #-- # qrz qrz qrz <my:callsign> pse k<stop>{{EOR}}

item.Title: Him de Me{{EOR}}
item.Definition: #++ # # Start of a reply to the other station, his callsign # is taken from the Add Log Entry Callsign field. # #-- # <his:callsign> <his:callsign> de <my:callsign> <my:callsign> <my:callsign> k<stop>{{EOR}}

item.Title: Report{{EOR}}
item.Definition: <his:callsign> <his:sent_rpt> <his:sent_rpt> de <my:callsign> kn<stop>{{EOR}}

item.Title: RST,QTH{{EOR}}
item.Definition: <his:callsign> de <my:callsign> rst: <his:sent> <his:sent> op: <my:name> <my:name> qth: <my:qth> loc: <my:locator> <my:locator> btu <his:callsign> de <my:callsign> pse kn <stop>{{EOR}}

item.Title: RST,QTH (long){{EOR}}
item.Definition: <his:callsign> de <my:callsign> hi <his:firstname>, 100% copy rst: <his:sent> <his:sent> name: <my:name> <my:name> qth: <my:qth> loc: <my:locator> <my:locator> btu <his:firstname>, <his:callsign> de <my:callsign> pse k<stop>{{EOR}}

item.Title: Station{{EOR}}
item.Definition: #++ # # All the toys in use at my station. # #-- # <his:callsign> de <my:callsign> <his:firstname>, my station trx: <my:radio> int: <my:interface> ant: <my:antenna> pwr: <my:power> please qsl via bureau or eQSL.cc. btu <his:callsign> de <my:callsign> kn <stop>{{EOR}}

item.Title: Callsign{{EOR}}
73{{EOR}}
item.Definition: #++ # # The end of the QSO, 73 and thanks for the QSO. # #-- # <his:callsign> de <my:callsign> Tnx fer qso, 73! sk sk <add-log> <stop>{{EOR}}

item.Title: 73 (long){{EOR}}
item.Definition: #++ # # The end of the QSO, 73 and thanks for the QSO. # #-- # <his:callsign> de <my:callsign> <his:firstname> tnx fer nice qso es hpe cuagn. gd lck es gd dx 73 <his:callsign> de <my:callsign> sk sk<add-log> <stop> {{EOR}}

item.Title: MFSK Picture{{EOR}}
item.Definition: #++ # # Send a picture (must be in MFSK mode). # #-- # <send-pic>{{EOR}}

item.Title: Call CQ (video){{EOR}}
item.Definition: #++ # # Short CQ call, stops TX when all text sent. # #-- # <ident:CQ> CQ CQ de <my:callsign> <my:callsign> CQ CQ de <my:callsign> <my:callsign> PSE K <stop>{{EOR}}

item.Title: 73 (Xmas){{EOR}}
item.Definition: #++ # # The end of the QSO, 73, Happy Christmas and thanks for the QSO. # #-- # <his:callsign> de <my:callsign> 73 and thanks for this <my:mode> QSO on <his:band>. Happy Christmas and a Peaceful New Year. <his:callsign> de <my:callsign> <add-log> k <stop>{{EOR}}

item.Title: 73 (video){{EOR}}
item.Definition: #++ # # The end of the QSO, 73 and thanks for the QSO. # Sends 73 using the video ID option <ident:73>. # #-- # <ident:73><his:callsign> de <my:callsign> 73 <his:firstname> and thanks for this <my:mode> QSO on <his:band>, good Luck and good DX. <his:callsign> de <my:callsign> sk sk <add-log> <stop>{{EOR}}

item.Title: BTU{{EOR}}
item.Definition: #++ # # Hand over to the other station. # #-- # So BTU <his:name>, <his:callsign> de <my:callsign> k <stop>{{EOR}}

item.Title: Logbook Statistics{{EOR}}
item.Definition: #++ # # Statistics from the logbook, make sure the current QSO is add before # using these tags. To add the current QSO use <add-log>. # # <qso-mode-count> returns the number of QSOs in the logbook for the # current ADIF mode. # # <qso-total-count> returns the total number of QSOs in the logbook. # #-- # <add-log> you are <qso-mode> QSO # <qso-mode-count> in my logbook.{{EOR}}

item.Title: WX{{EOR}}
item.Definition: #++ # # The weather, values from the Tags. # #-- # Weather here is <my:weather> temp is <my:temperature>{{EOR}}

item.Title: Him de Me K{{EOR}}
item.Definition: #++ # # End of a reply to the other station, his callsign # is taken from the Add Log Entry Callsign field. # #-- # <his:callsign> de <my:callsign> <my:callsign> pse kn <stop>{{EOR}}

item.Title: Testing{{EOR}}
item.Definition: #++ # # Just for testing purposes. # #-- # Testing Testing Testing de <my:callsign> <my:callsign> <my:callsign> Testing Testing Testing de <my:callsign> <my:callsign> <my:callsign> Testing Testing Testing de <my:callsign> <my:callsign> <my:callsign> Closing <stop>{{EOR}}

item.Title: QSL{{EOR}}
item.Definition: QSL UR <his:sent> <his:sent> DE <my:callsign> <my:callsign> KN<stop>{{EOR}}

item.Title: 73 (short){{EOR}}
item.Definition: Tnx,73 <his:callsign> de <my:callsign> sk sk<add-log> <stop> {{EOR}}
